```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r loading_data, echo = FALSE}
birthdays <- read_csv(file = "birthdates.csv",
                      col_types = cols(value = col_character()))

```

```{r cleaning_data, echo = FALSE}
modified_birthdays <- birthdays %>% 
  mutate(birth_dates = str_sub(value, 2, 11)) %>% 
  mutate(birth_dates = make_date(birth_dates))
print(modified_birthdays)
```
